txt.en: 'Seven gold to be the final bid price for this figurine ...'
'SOLD! Auction sold for seven gold to the gentleman in the second row.'
'That will conclude our current auction for the hour. Please head over to Vault-Keeper to complete your purchase. Thank you!'
'Hmph! I could have sworn I heard about that working at auction. Oh well.'
'Congratulations on your success at auction. Please head through the door on your right.'
'The figurine sold for seven gold to the gentleman in the second row.'
Aldburg
'Excuse me, Gentleman.'
Curator
'The Auction shall begin shortly.'
'The auction will now begin for this authentic rider figurine. Found in the Everholt, this a relic of Folca King's time!'
'I am sorry that I am late, did I miss anything?'
'Five gold! We have a bid from the esquire in the third row. I repeat, the current bid is five gold pieces.'
'We will start the bidding at one gold piece. Do I hear one gold piece?'
'Six gold, five-hundred silver.'
'One gold.'
'Very good! We have six gold, five hundred silver pieces as the current bid for this beautiful figurine.'
'We have a current bid of one gold, I repeat one gold.'
'Again, five gold pieces!'
'One gold, five hundred silver.'
'I'm sorry sir? The current bid is at six gold, five hundred silver pieces. You will have to bid higher I'm afraid.'
'Seven gold!'
'Nonsense! Again I bid five!'
'Sir! If you continue to shout out five I will be forced to have the guards escort you out.'
'Now, I have a current bid of seven gold. I repeat seven gold. Do I hear eight?'
'We are at seven gold. Again, do I hear a bid for eight?'
'I have two gold, five hundred silver going once.'
'Three gold. I bid three gold.'
'Gah! Too rich for my blood.'
'We have a current bid of three gold pieces.'
'Three gold, five-hundred!'
'That is three gold, five-hundred silver to the young lady over there. I repeat three gold, five hundred silver. Do I hear four gold?'
'This auction is all mine. Trust me, I am assured of it!'
'Four gold? Do I hear four gold?'
'I BID FIVE!'
'That is beyond me.'
'We have a current bid of one gold, five hundred silver. I repeat one gold, five hundred silver.'
'Right here, one gold seven hundred and fifty silver.'
'We have a current bid of one gold, seven hundred and fifty silver. I repeat one gold, seven hundred and fifty silver.'
'Two gold!'
'We have a current bid of two gold pieces. Do I hear two gold, five hundred silver?'
'Over here!'
'My lady, I have you bidding two gold, five hundred silver pieces, is that correct?'
'Aye.'
'Very well, my lady. We have a confirmed bid of two gold, five hundred silver pieces. I am looking for three gold pieces.'
'Again, looking for three gold pieces. Do I see anyone for three gold pieces?'
'Seven gold is the current bid, going once!'
'Seven gold bid on this figurine, going twice!'
